mapper.select: SELECT ORDERNUMBER, MEMBERID, MEMBERNAME, MEMBERTEL, MEMBERADDRESS, PRICE, ORDERINFO, MENUNAME, AMOUNT, STORENAME, STOREADDRESS, STORETEL, ORDERTIME, STATE, HIT FROM FOODORDER

SELECT RM, ORDERNUMBER, MEMBERID, MEMBERNAME, MEMBERTEL, MEMBERADDRESS, PRICE, ORDERINFO, MENUNAME, AMOUNT, STORENAME, STOREADDRESS, STORETEL, ORDERTIME, STATE, HIT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ORDERNUMBER DESC) RM, ORDERNUMBER, MEMBERID, MEMBERNAME, MEMBERTEL, MEMBERADDRESS, PRICE, ORDERINFO, MENUNAME, AMOUNT, STORENAME, STOREADDRESS, STORETEL, ORDERTIME, STATE, HIT FROM FOODORDER) WHERE RM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY ORDERNUMBER
